name: CoBuddy
0:
”Alexa, open cobuddy test”
”Alexa, start cobuddy test”
”Alexa, launch cobuddy test”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cobuddy test
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill provides short interactions to elevate users' mood through mindfulness, humor, compassion, self-compassion and positivity.

This skill was designed to test the feasibility of short conversations with adolescents in improving their mood. These conversations are based on techniques derived from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy modifications. These conversations are less than 5 minutes in length and support no more than 6 conversation turns. Currently, this skill supports 15 interactions related to mindfulness, humor, compassion, self-compassion and positivity. 

This study is being conducted by researchers at the Pratt Institute in New York, USA.

The study aims to understand the effects of COVID-19 on adolescents' wellbeing. The study will explore the use of conversational assistant (Amazon Alexa) to alleviate some of the negative effects of social isolation, including loneliness
